languages.text: Если персонаж атакует рукопашным оружием цель, она может попытаться одновременно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} ее, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Чем выше показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} у атакующего, тем проще ему преодолеть парирование. Чем выше {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} атакующего — тем ему проще преодолеть уклонение.
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж атакует рукопашным оружием цель, она попытается {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклониться{/g} от атаки, а затем {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} ее, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Если хотя бы одна из этих двух проверок успешна, то цель избежит атаки.

Если персонаж атакует рукопашным оружием цель, она попытается {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклониться{/g} от атаки, а затем {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} ее, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Если хотя бы одна из этих двух проверок успешна, то цель избежит атаки.

languages.text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.
languages.original_text: Если персонаж атакует рукопашным оружием цель, она может попытаться одновременно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атаки и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} ее, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Чем выше показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} у атакующего, тем проще ему преодолеть парирование. Чем выше {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} атакующего — тем ему проще преодолеть уклонение.

traits.locale_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

languages.text: Wenn ein Charakter ein Ziel mit einer Nahkampfwaffe angreift, kann das Ziel versuchen, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} und ihn zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, sofern es ebenfalls eine Nahkampfwaffe einsetzt. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaftswert{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} des Angreifers ist, desto leichter kann er den Parieren-Versuch des Ziels ignorieren. Je höher {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Angreifers sind, desto leichter kann er den Ausweichen-Versuch des Ziels ignorieren.
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Charakter ein Ziel mit einer Nahkampfwaffe angreift, kann das Ziel versuchen, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}auszuweichen{/g} oder ihn zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, wenn es ebenfalls eine Nahkampfwaffe einsetzt. Wie ein Zeil auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} reagiert, hängt davon ab, was höher ist: seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} oder seine Ausweichen-Chance. Je mehr die {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} des Angreifers die des Ziels übertrifft, desto unwahrscheinlicher ist es, dass das Ziel den Angriff parieren kann.

languages.text: Si un personnage attaque à l'aide d'une arme de mêlée, sa cible peut tenter d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque et, si elle utilise également une arme de mêlée, de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}. Plus le score de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'attaquant est élevé, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la tentative de parade de la cible. Plus la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant sont élevées, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la tentative d'esquive de la cible.
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

traits.locale_text: Si un personnage attaque à l'aide d'une arme de mêlée, sa cible peut tenter d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque et, si elle utilise également une arme de mêlée, de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}. Plus le score de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'attaquant est élevé, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la tentative de parade de la cible. Plus la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'attaquant sont élevées, plus il a de chance d'ignorer la tentative d'esquive de la cible.

languages.text: 当角色使用近战武器攻击目标时，目标尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，如果目标同样使用近战武器，还会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}这次攻击。攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}越是高于目标的武器技能，此次攻击突破招架，造成伤害的几率就越高。攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}越高，此次攻击就越容易突破目标的闪避，命中目标。
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

traits.locale_text: 当角色使用近战武器攻击目标时，目标会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}攻击。如果目标也同样使用近战武器，则可能会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击。目标对{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}的防御手段取决于哪个数值更高，是{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}属性，还是闪避几率。{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}攻击者的武器技能越高于目标的武器技能，目标成功招架攻击的可能性就越低。

languages.text: Si un personaje ataca a un enemigo con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, el objetivo intentará {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} y, si también usa un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} el ataque. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del atacante, mayor es la posibilidad de que el objetivo no pueda parar el ataque y sufra daños. Del mismo modo, una mayor {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} facilitan que el atacante inflija daños a pesar de la esquiva del enemigo.
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

traits.locale_text: Si un personaje ataca a un objetivo con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, el objetivo puede intentar {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} el ataque o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararlo{/g} si también tiene un arma cuerpo a cuerpo. La reacción del objetivo a los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} depende de qué sea más alto, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} o su probabilidad de esquiva. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de armas del atacante en comparación con la del objetivo, menos probable es que pueda parar el ataque.

languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the attack or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if they are also using a melee weapon. How a target reacts to a melee attack depends on which is higher — their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic or their dodge chance. The more the attacker's Weapon Skill surpasses that of their target, the less likely it is that the target will successfully parry the attack.

languages.text: キャラクターが近接武器でターゲットを攻撃するとき、ターゲットは攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を試みたり、相手も近接武器を使用している場合は、攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}可能性がある。アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}スコアが高いほど、ターゲットの受け流しを無視しやすい。アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が高いほど、ターゲットが回避できないようにしやすくなる。
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが近接武器を使用しているターゲットを同じく近接武器で攻撃する際、ターゲットは攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を試みる可能性がある。ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}に対する反応は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}能力と回避率のどちらが高いかにより異なる。アタッカーの武器{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}がターゲットの武器スキルより優れていればいるほど、そのターゲットが攻撃の受け流しに成功する可能性は下がる。

languages.text: Karakter bir hedefe yakın dövüş silahıyla saldırırsa hedef hem saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmaya{/g} hem de o da yakın dövüş silahı kullanıyorsa saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturmaya{/g} teşebbüs edebilir. Saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliği{/g} ne kadar yüksekse hedefin savuşturma teşebbüsünü yok sayması da o kadar kolay olur. Saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} nitelikleri ne kadar yüksekse hedefin kaçınma teşebbüsünü yok sayması da o kadar kolay olur.
languages.original_text: If a character attacks a target with a melee weapon, the target may attempt to both {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the attack and, if they are also using a melee weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score is, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's parry attempt. The higher the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are, the easier it is for them to ignore the target's dodge attempt.
